actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to extend for 3 years the programs for comprehensive State and areawide health planning, and for comprehensive public health service and health services development, and to repeal a requirement that at least 15 percent of a State's formula allotment for public health services be available only for mental health services.

summary.text: Extends for three years (through fiscal year 1976) the programs for comprehensive State and areawide health planning, and for comprehensive public health service and health services development. Repeals the requirement that at 15 percent of a State's formula allotment for public health services be available only for mental health services.

titles.title: A bill to extend for 3 years the programs for comprehensive State and areawide health planning, and for comprehensive public health service and health services development, and to repeal a requirement that at least 15 percent of a State's formula allotment for public health services be available only for mental health services.
